meanings.definition: To clean with a vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent1: Mom hoovers the carpet every Saturday.
meanings.sent2: She hoovers the living room before guests arrive.
meanings.sent3: Dad hoovers so much, he might start vacuuming the yard!
meanings.sent4: The vacuum hoovers up all the dust bunnies in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the vacuum hoovering is oddly satisfying.

meanings.sent1: My grandma's hoovers is very old but still works well.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy a new hoovers for our house.
meanings.sent3: The hoovers in the store comes in different colors.
meanings.sent4: She compared the suction power of different hoovers before choosing one.
meanings.sent5: The hoovers has a sleek design and is easy to use.
